document_data.name: Oneshield Quarries
document_data.mainbody: '''Oneshield Quarries''' was a stone-cutting business owned by the [[dwarf]] [[Jarth Oneshield]] in the town of [[Red Larch]] around 1366 DR. [[Volothamp Geddarm|Volo]] noted that although the prices were high, this was justified by the quality of the work, and Jarth was able to pay his employees well.
document_data.Location: Oneshield Quarries's dwarven and human workers mined stone in four quarries in the hills east of town. These quarries were guarded by mercenary warriors and adventurers, funded by Jarth Oneshield.
